text:
When a child of a (parent in authoring state) is published, the error-message is
not user-centric (no idea if this word exists in English):

The parameter [params] must not be null!

org.apache.cocoon.ProcessingException: Sitemap: error calling continuation at
<map:call> -
file:/export/home/lenya/src/lenya-trunk/build/lenya/webapp/lenya/modules/usecase/usecase.xmap:92:39
at <map:mount> -
file:/export/home/lenya/src/lenya-trunk/build/lenya/webapp/lenya/usecase.xmap:57:131
at <map:mount> -
file:/export/home/lenya/src/lenya-trunk/build/lenya/webapp/global-sitemap.xmap:306:105
at <map:mount> -
file:/export/home/lenya/src/lenya-trunk/build/lenya/webapp/sitemap.xmap:651:106

cause: java.lang.RuntimeException: The parameter [params] must not be null!
creator: ragaller@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text:
The error messages should be clearer now.

We could evaluate the preconditions when displaying the overview and disable the
non-executable usecases, but that would probably make it considerably slower.
